import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { constructor(private router:Router){} navigateProg(path:string){ this.router.navigate([path]) } }
